partintro.para: Util plugin is composed of sample codes with sample screens for use of Date, Digest, Number, String, Validation utilities included in Anyframe core services.
Install Util plugin by entering the following command in the Command window.
The installation result can be checked through the installed (mvn anyframe:installed) or the jetty:run (mvn clean jetty:run) commands.

book.part:
Utility
The Util plugin provides sample screens that can be easily utilized for each of the Date, Digest, Number, String, and Validation utilities provided by core services.
Name Description
DateUtil calculation of the date, time and day using Joda Time, validity check and format change
DigestUtil encoding/decoding of relevant strings using character set, base64, or algorithm
NumberUtil calculation, search, conversion and validity check of numbers
StringUtil search, conversion, substitution, and validity check of strings
ValidationUtil validity check of resident registration, corporation, business registration, and aliens registration numbers using regular expression and format validity check of telephone, mobile phone and card numbers and e-mail
